text: Kapena kasin'ja kuti: “Tungaŵe uwwepe ni ŵachatutuluchile chitabu, tungaliji ŵakongoka nnope kwapunda ŵanganyao.” Basi pamasile pachim'bichilile chimanyilo (chakumanyukuka) chakuumila kwa M’mbuje gwenu (jajili Qur’an) soni chongolo kwisa soni chanasa, ana nduni jwali jwalupuso nnope kumpunda jwaagakaaniile ma Ȃya ga Allah ni kugatundumalila? Tuchalipila aŵala ŵaakugatundumalila ma Ȃya Getu ilagasyo yakusakala nnope ligongo lyakutundumala kwao
